text: Castleton station or Castleton railway station may refer to: *Castleton station (Vermont), an Amtrak station in Castleton, Vermont, U.S.A. *Castleton railway station, a railway station in Castleton, Greater Manchester, England *Castleton Moor railway station, a railway station in Castleton, North Yorkshire, England ==See also== *Castleton (disambiguation)
title: Castleton station
